headline: Ventas Results And Dividend Raise Highlight Senior Housing Growth Focus
summary: Ventas (NYSE:VTR) reported strong 2025 financial results, highlighted by substantial growth in normalized funds from operations. The company posted solid same store income growth in its senior housing portfolio in 2025. Ventas increased its quarterly dividend by 8% and announced significant additional investments in senior housing. For investors watching NYSE:VTR, the latest update comes with the stock trading at $82.55 and a track record of strong recent returns, including 6.3% over the...

headline: Ventas (VTR) Is Up 6.3% After Dividend Hike And 2026 Guidance Update Has The Bull Case Changed?
summary: In early February 2026, Ventas, Inc.’s board raised its quarterly cash dividend by 8% to US$0.52 per share and issued 2026 earnings guidance that includes Attributable Net Income Per Share of US$0.52 to US$0.62, following the release of its fourth-quarter and full-year 2025 results. The company reported higher full-year 2025 net income and earnings per share alongside strong funds-from-operations trends and senior housing cash NOI growth, underscoring how its recent US$7.00 billion capital...
